entry.def: Backup consists of extra equipment, resources, or people that you can get help or support from if necessary.

example.ex: There is no emergency back-up immediately available...
example.tran: 手头无法获得应急支持。

example.ex: Alternative treatments can provide a useful back-up to conventional treatment.
example.tran: 替代疗法能为传统的治疗提供有效的辅助。

entry.def: If you have something such as a  second piece of equipment or set of plans as backup, you have arranged for them to be available for use in case the first one does not work.

example.ex: Every part of the system has a backup...
example.tran: 系统的每个部分都有备用元件。

example.ex: Computer users should make regular back-up copies of their work.
example.tran: 计算机使用者应该定期对自己的工作进行备份。

means.word_mean: 1. an accumulation caused by clogging or a stoppage;

sentences.sentence: "a traffic backup on the main street"
"he discovered a backup in the toilet"

means.word_mean: 2. someone who takes the place of another (as when things get dangerous or difficult);

sentences.sentence: "the star had a stand-in for dangerous scenes"
"we need extra employees for summer fill-ins"

means.word_mean: 3. a subordinate musical part; provides background for more important parts
4. (computer science) a copy of a file or directory on a separate storage device;

sentences.sentence: "he made a backup in case the original was accidentally damaged or erased"

means.word_mean: 5. the act of providing approval and support;

sentences.sentence: "his vigorous backing of the conservatives got him in trouble with progressives"

stems_affixes.word_buile: up向上+front前面→在前面,在上面
up向上+front前面→在前面,在上面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 侯补,备用物,后备人员,支援者
stems_affixes.word_buile: back背后+up向上→在背后向上推→支持
up向上+heav=heave举起+al状态,性质→n.动乱,大变动

stems_affixes.value_cn: 机构,设置,装备,组织,计划,调整

up向上+braid辫子→向上抓辫子→责骂
up向上+hold拿住→向上拿住→支持

sentences.cn: 医院有备用发电机以防停电。

sentences.en: She once sang backup for Madonna.
